{{medicine.id}} {{medicine.drugsName}} {{medicine.stock}} {{medicine.registerDate | date: 'd MMMM, yyyy, h:mm a'}} {{medicine.updatedDate ? (medicine.updatedDate | date: 'MMMM d, yyyy, h:mm a') : '-'}} {{medicine.medicineId}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { MedicineService } from '../medicine.service'; import { Medicine } from '../medicine'; @Component({ selector: 'app-medicinelist', templateUrl: './medicinelist.component.html', styleUrls: ['./medicinelist.component.css'] }) export class MedicinelistComponent { medicines: Medicine[] = []; constructor(private medicineService: MedicineService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.getMedicines(); } getMedicines() { this.medicineService.getMedicines().subscribe(data => { this.medicines = data; }) } }
